custom_item_2.info: NOTE : Update DB2_VERSION to the appropriate value for your local environment.

custom_item_6.info: NOTE : Update DB2_VERSION to the appropriate value for your local environment.

custom_item_10.description: 3.1.6 Secure permission of default database location
custom_item_10.info: NOTE : Update DEFAULT_DB_PATH to the appropriate value for your local environment.

custom_item_11.info:
The diaglevel parameter specifies the location of the diagnostic files for the DB2 instance.

  It is recommended that this parameter be set to a secure location.

  NOTE: Update DB2_VERSION to the appropriate value for your local environment.

  NOTE: Verify that the location found for the diagpath parameter is secured.

  NOTE: Nessus has provided the target output to assist in reviewing the benchmark to ensure target compliance.

custom_item_12.description: 3.2.4 Establish secure archive log location - 'logarchmeth1 location'
custom_item_12.info:
The logarchmeth1 parameter specifies the type of media used for the primary destination for archived logs.

  It is recommended that this parameter be set to a secure location.

  NOTE: Update DB2_VERSION to the appropriate value for your local environment.

  NOTE: Change DB to the database that is being audited.

  NOTE: Verify that the location found for the logarchmeth1 parameter is secured.

  NOTE: Nessus has provided the target output to assist in reviewing the benchmark to ensure target compliance.

custom_item_13.description: 3.2.5 Secure permission of the primary archive log location
custom_item_13.info: NOTE : Update ARCH_LOG_LOCATION_1 to the appropriate value for your local environment.

custom_item_14.description: 3.2.6 Establish secure secondary archive location - 'logarchmeth2 location'
custom_item_14.info:
The logarchmeth2 parameter specifies the type of media used for the secondary destination for archived logs.

  It is recommended that this parameter be set to a secure location.

  NOTE: Update DB2_VERSION to the appropriate value for your local environment.

  NOTE: Change DB to the database that is being audited.

  NOTE: Verify that the location found for the logarchmeth2 parameter is secured.

  NOTE: Nessus has provided the target output to assist in reviewing the benchmark to ensure target compliance.

custom_item_15.description: 3.2.7 Secure permission of the secondary archive log location
custom_item_15.info: NOTE : Update ARCH_LOG_LOCATION_2 to the appropriate value for your local environment.

custom_item_16.description: 3.2.8 Establish secure tertiary archive location - 'failarchpath location'
custom_item_16.info:
The failarchpath parameter specifies the location for the archive logs if the primary or secondary archive destination is not available.

  It is recommended that this parameter be set to a secure location.

  NOTE: Update DB2_VERSION to the appropriate value for your local environment.

  NOTE: Change DB to the database that is being audited.

  NOTE: Verify that the found location found for the failarchpath parameter is secured.

  NOTE: Nessus has provided the target output to assist in reviewing the benchmark to ensure target compliance.

custom_item_17.description: 3.2.9 Secure permission of the tertiary archive location
custom_item_17.info: NOTE : Update ARCH_LOG_FAIL to the appropriate value for your local environment.

custom_item_18.description: 3.2.10 Establish secure log mirror location - 'mirrorlogpath location'
custom_item_18.info:
The mirrorlogpath parameter specifies a location to store the mirror copy of the logs.

  It is recommended that this parameter be set to a secure location

  NOTE: Update DB2_VERSION to the appropriate value for your local environment.

  NOTE: Change DB to the database that is being audited.

  NOTE: Verify that the location found for the mirrorlogpath parameter is secured.

  NOTE: Nessus has provided the target output to assist in reviewing the benchmark to ensure target compliance.

custom_item_19.info:
The dasadm_group parameter defines the group name with DAS Administration (DASADM) authority for the DAS.

  It is recommended that dasadm_group group contains authorized users only.

  NOTE: Review the list of users found to be in the dasadm_group to ensure only authorized users exist.

  NOTE: Update DB2_VERSION to the appropriate value for your local environment.

  NOTE: Nessus has provided the target output to assist in reviewing the benchmark to ensure target compliance.

custom_item_20.info:
The sysmaint_group parameter defines the system administrator group with system maintenance (SYSMAINT) authority.

  It is recommended that sysmaint_group group contains authorized users only.

  NOTE: Update DB2_VERSION to the appropriate value for your local environment.

  NOTE: Review the found SYSMAINT group name to ensure it is a valid group name for your organization.

  NOTE: Nessus has provided the target output to assist in reviewing the benchmark to ensure target compliance.

custom_item_21.info:
It is recommended that sysmon_group group contains authorized users only.

  NOTE: Update DB2_VERSION to the appropriate value for your local environment.

  NOTE: Review the found SYSMON group name to ensure it is a valid group name for your organization.

  NOTE: Nessus has provided the target output to assist in reviewing the benchmark to ensure target compliance.
